channel.title: Git on Loving life and dreams.
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Loving life and dreams.

item.title: Github push failï¼šCould not resolve hostname
item.description:
Usually the most commonly used git push command suddenly can not be used (error log as follows), the brain first jumped out of the idea is: Is Github again by the wall! This has happened before and requires accelerated access by specifying hosts.

Error log returned after git push execution:

ssh: Could not resolve hostname github.com:elkan1788: nodename nor servname provided, or not known
fatal: Could not read from remote repository.
Please make sure you have the correct access rights

item.title: Git action command collection
item.description: All say good sex is not as bad as bad writing, there is nothing wrong with it. Although learning Git has been for more than a year, but sometimes the less used commands are always a moment to remember. So decided to write it into the blog, not only to share the experience, but also easy to find their own, this blog post will continue to add up. .
